content: अनेक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not one; more than one, many; अनेकपितृकाणां तु पितृतो भागकल्पना <ls>Y. 2. 120</ls>, <ls>Ki. 1. 16</ls>; several, various; तथात्मैकोऽप्यनेकश्च <ls>Y. 3. 144.</ls> {@--2@} Separated; divided; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab>; °आकार having many shapes or forms; diverse, multiform; °कालं-वारं several times, many a time and oft; °भार्य having more wives than one.
